Create a new data set

Parameters:
fontName - The name of the font generated
size - The size of the font generated
lineHeight - The height of a line of text
width - The width of the texture generated
height - The height of the texture generated
setName - The name of the set
imageName - The name of the image

                           java.lang.String imageName)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Output this data set as an angle code XML data file

Parameters:
out - The output stream to write to
imageName - The name of the image
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Indicates a failure to build the XML

addCharacter

public void addCharacter(int code,
                         int xadvance,
                         int x,
                         int y,
                         int width,
                         int height,
                         int yoffset)
Add a character to the data set

Parameters:
code - The character code
xadvance - The advance on the x axis after writing this character
x - The x position on the sheet of the character
y - The y position on the sheet of the character
width - The width of the character on the sheet
height - The height of the character on the sheet
yoffset - The offset on the y axis when drawing the character

addKerning

public void addKerning(int first,
                       int second,
                       int offset)
Add some kerning data

Parameters:
first - The first character
second - The second character
offset - The kerning offset to apply
